amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that the agency would retain the discretion to determine whether to provide advance notice, not later than 90 days, of a proposed rule prior to it being published in the Federal Register.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 112-296 to clarify that the agency would retain the discretion to determine whether to provide advanced notice, not later than 90 days, of a proposed rule prior to it being published in the Federal Register.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 250 (Roll no. 883).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 250 (Roll no. 883).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
